website_summaries.verdict: For investors, homeowners, and self-employed filers with more complex tax issues, this fits the bill – but be sure to update the software when prompted to keep up with tax updates.
pros: Guides users through Schedule C and Schedule A form filing
cons: May not include forms needed for more complex situations
Multi-owner businesses will need a business-specific tax prep program
Customer support can be hard to reach

customer_reviews.title: Will not initalize on a MAC running Catalina 10.15
customer_reviews.text: Wasted time with H&R Block on the phone. Granting permissions did not work. Amazon will not return my purchase price because this is software. Last tome I will purchase download software from Amazon. Good luck to anyone who has success with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Skihop

customer_reviews.title: Unable to E-File on Mac Catalina! [UPDATE]
customer_reviews.text: For several hours over a couple days I tried to trouble shoot this, including a long phone call with tech support. I kept getting an "SSL Error" message and no matter what I tried or whose tips/hints I used, nothing worked. I use OSX 10.15.3 Catalina. [UPDATE] - After hours of poking around, this worked for me: System Preferences > Security > Firewall > Firewall Options > add the H&R Block application to your permitted connections
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I assumed this would work on my brand new Mac. Nope. Doesn't work with the latest operating systems. Also, Amazon does not return software. I made two decisions today: No longer use H and R block. Do not buy software from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Grove City mom

customer_reviews.title: I love HR block software
customer_reviews.text: I love HR block software for filing my taxes. I have a small business but it isn't so big that I need an accountant. It asks all the right questions and makes filing taxes super easy. I've been using it for many years (it used to go by another name). I am especially excited about the 4% Refund Bonus offer which makes it even better. Very pleased! Will continue to buy every year.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works on OSX 10.15.1
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually submit reviews but I thought it was important to share my experience. Based on some of the other reviews, I was a little concerned that I might have problems with OSX Catalina; however, the program runs find on my computer--just as it has in prior years. I dragged the file to Applications folder and it opened without any warnings or crashes. The only prompt I received was to allow the program permission to access my Documents folder.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Works on a Mac but not easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product which stated it was for a Mac and was $10 cheaper than Turbo Tax It can be used on a Mac but I had to call customer service several times to get it to download which made it take a couple of days. Ended up buying TurboTax after this program would not seem to let me override one line for a credit due on a long term loss carryover. Seemed to keep putting it as a gain. I will not be using this again. Trying to save $10 cost me $60 in the end.
customer_reviews.author: ponys

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time user of Turbo Tax but tried to make the switch to HR Block this year to save a few bucks. Big mistake. This software WILL NOT import data from previous versions of Turbo Tax, regardless of what they may say. I tried to get a refund from Amazon the same day I purchased it and was told the software WAS NOT returnable for a refund (I purchased a digital download). I don't return very many items, but this is the first time in memory that I was denied a return by Amazon. Again, be very careful buying this software if you intend to import data from another vendor's software.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Download Would Not Open
customer_reviews.text: Program went to application folder but had error message when I tried to install. No way to get refund on Amazon web site. Had numerous conversations with H&R Block but no luck. No one seems to know how to refund my purchase. Ended up buying the disk and loading it on a different Mac and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: E-file not working due to error
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Although it was stable on Catalina and I got through everything without any crashes etc., when I submitted my completed return through e-file it was immediately rejected by the IRS due to an error with this software. The software message then explains HR Block is working on a fix that won't be ready until later this month. You can't sell this software and have issues like that. It should be fixed within hours, not weeks. They should offer some kind of compensation for this delay.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Poor Tech/Troubleshooting Support
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Easier to use and clearer than TurboTax - Cheaper than TurboTax - No issues installing on newest Mac OS Cons: - Unable to e-file despite e-file eligibility - Tech support twice "elevated" the e-file issue and twice promised to "get back to me" in 72 hours. I never received a follow-up. After the second tech support failure, I bought TurboTax, re-entered all my tax info, and e-filed immediately. H&R Block is probably still preferable if you're filing by mail given its clarity and lower cost. However, if you're buying the program to e-file, I cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Problems on MacOS Mojave
customer_reviews.text: I tried every solution I could find on the internet for the startup problems with this on my Mac (running Mojave) and NOTHING worked. What a waste of $50! I can't believe there are no refunds for software that won't run when you download, meeting the minimum requirements. I've used this same software for several years now, each time downloading through Amazon, but never again. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Clemens non Mama

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE customer service.  Try something else.
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally do reviews, but this is the worse product I've purchased from Amazon. The activation did not work. I had to call for a new activation code. I was able to do my taxes, but when it came time to e-file, the code did not work. I called HR Block and stayed on hold for almost 3 hours. A rep answered the called after 2.5 hours, left me on hold for another 30 mins then hung up. Disgusting customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Qiana

customer_reviews.title: Good program
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t have completed my taxes without it. Only gave it a four star because you have to pay to e-file your state taxes. If you don’t want to pay extra you have to print them and mail them in.
customer_reviews.author: frosty

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for use in US Territories.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend using this software to file your taxes if you reside in the Virgin Islands. Especially if you have self employment income. This software will not auto generate form 1040-SS and will not make the necessary adjustments to form 1040. Also the steps for saving your document has also changed and I was not able to save my document to my MacBook Pro. A PDF copy only open using the H&R app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Down load software does not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to order the PC disc version, But was charged for a mac downloaded version. I do not have a mac. I have used H&R BLOCK for several years. I realize that AMAZON does not refund software, but I have not downloaded the software. and believe that a refund is called for ?
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF TIME & MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This is crap, it continually closes out on me and loses all of my progress. Of course I cannot get a refund either, so I recomend NOT BUYING THIS!!!! WASTE OF TIME & MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Dozanti

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SOFTWARE FOR RENTAL+SELF EMPLOYED
customer_reviews.text: Have used H+R Block software for years and it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: not david (nancy)

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: hey, it’s tax software. no crashes, no hangs, no install problems. zzzzzzzz.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This download was advertised as including one State Tax Program, but i am not able to select any state. Is there something wrong with your download link?
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to do your Texas with H&R software
customer_reviews.text: I like familiarity, and simple way to compute your business expenses
customer_reviews.author: Abdirizak Omar

customer_reviews.title: Terrible with Mac Catalina.
customer_reviews.text: I have used H&R Block for years. This year I can’t get it to load my Dropbox saved files, which is where I save my returns. I use OSX Catalina. When I called tech support and waited about 15 minutes. They couldn’t find my E-Mail although I registered not one but two copies. They acted like I had not purchased the software although they did not say that. After about 30 minutes I was told to call back when I had more information. They should have coordinated better with Apple before releasing this crippled version. Purchased from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: William Boone

product_meta.title: H&R Block Tax Software Premium 2019 with 4% Refund Bonus Offer [Amazon Exclusive] [Mac Download]
product_meta.description:
Platform:Mac Download| Edition:PremiumH&R Block Premium Tax Software offers everything a self-employed filer or rental property owner needs to easily complete federal and state taxes, including FREE tax advice via onlace chat.

Minimum System Requirements:

 * Operating System: 10.9 Mavericks
 * Processor: 32-bit
feature_bullets: Five free federal e-files and unlimited federal preparation and printing
One state program download included - a $39.95 value
Advanced Schedule C guidance to maximize deductions for self-employment income
Schedule E guidance for rental property income and expenses
Reporting assistance on income from investments, stock options, home sales, and retirement
Quickly import your W-2, 1099, 1098, last year's personal tax return
Free live product help via chat - or get tax help from a tax expert for a fee
Help Center has more than 13,000 articles, frequently asked questions, and tips in case you get stuck while preparing your taxes
Must allocate all or a portion of Federal refund to Amazon.com Gift Card to receive 4% Refund Bonus

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
